title: • Sonar
text: @vpetersson created a project to scan the area for Bluetooth low-energy (BLE) devices and produce user-friendly reports: https://github.com/databat-io/sonar

title: • Balena Dashboard
text: Inspired by balenaDash, @willswire created an ElectronJS version of the project: https://github.com/willswire/balena-dashboards

title: • Robot Army Fleet With Balena
text: Mitch Allen wrote about updating your robot army fleet with balena: https://desertbot.io/blog/raspberry-pi-balena-resin
Feel free to give them a try and let the world know how you get on in the forums; the authors of these projects would love to know how youâ€™re using them.
